responses.introduction: Greetings earthling. I am really getting 'down' and also 'jiggy with it' at this 'shindig'.
responses.Big Footprint: I am sorry, my 'fooot' is smaller than that shape.
responses.Small Footprint: That looks similar to the size of my standing appendage.
responses.Glasses: Yes - without my seeing tubes I would not be able to understand your heiroglyphics.
responses.Bag: As it happens, I left my only container on my shuttle
responses.Lipstick: Apologies, I am not sure that I know what that is - no I don't.
responses.Right Handed: Yes I have a slight preference when accomplishing tasks to use my right appendage
responses.Dark Hair: I am sorry to dissapoint you, but I have no hair.
